description.p: Dunjin's cutlass is a magic item bestowed to him by a very close friend, who seems to be a master craftsman since this weapon along with Dunjin's arm are imaculate in design and function.
Perfect DesignDunjin's cutlass gains +2 to attack and damage. It also capable damaging anything and everything regardless of immunities, it also can't be destroyed or weakened in anyway.
